column5: Sept 11th 2001..........God Bless those who died that day, especially those First Responders who ran into those building as others were running out.  REST IN PEACE

Totally agree with the above,  we can all remember what we were doing when the Towers got hit. Many killed and injured. Something like that is never forgotten. God Bless all the wonderful people who laid it on the line that day. Gone but not forgotten.

The world changed forever since that horrible day in history. My Mom was a kid when Pearl Harbor was attacked and she said it was the exact feeling on 9/11. We must never forget the sacrifices of the fallen that day or any day in fact. These people run into a burning building not from it. Those are real heroes in life, not the ones on screen or on the field. Those going into work that lost their lives will not be forgotten as well.  Rest in peace.
Was unreal Remember it like it was yesterday.

It was great to see lots of rememberence posts on social media about it as well as pics & stories as we lost many Canadians there as well !!!  There was even a story about the last remaining service dog who was there and even he got recognized for the job they all performed
